'United Rugby' is a Canadian rugby union club that is based in Coquitlam,
British Columbia. It was formed in 2005 with the joining of Pocomo RFC and
Douglas RFC.

United Rugby fields men's teams in the [http://www.esportsdesk.com/leagues/fron-
t_pagebcru.cfm?leagueID=6041&clientID=175&link=bcru BC First Division League]
(1st, 2nd, and 3rd divisions), and Under-19 and Under-17 teams.

Womenâs teams are fielded in the BC Premier League, and 1st division, as well
as Under-18.

United Rugby is also host to a mini-rugby program consisting of players age 5-
14.
